name: Lachesis ∨ Atropos
description:
Please be advised that this visual novel contains violence, death, cults, monstrous creatures, and alcohol abuse. Expand for more detailed content warnings

Blood, stabbings, dismemberment, removal of limbs, parasitism, drowning, eye trauma, head trauma, gaslighting, hospitalization, falling, implied neglect

Story

A private investigator visits a small town after recovering from a coma. She searches for her mentor's lost beloved, but the very eyes she was born with, those that can see the black strings of hate, drag her down into the darkness of conspiracy.

A cult, two priestesses, and the threads that puppet the world.

Features
  • ~45k words
  • 4 major endings and plenty of dead ends
  • 8 CGs
  • 6 original tracks
  • Accessibility options
